title: How to Get on the Front Page of Digg

steps.headline: Realize that the new Digg is ruled by popularity in posts with the news article on the social networks.Their systems are set up so that the amount of comments a new post gets, will trigger the system to post it to the main site (if it gets enough "votes").
Post about popular topics on Twitter.
steps.description: Retweet new news media from sites that you follow that broadcast news.

steps.headline: Share/reshare stories from other liked accounts you tend to follow on Facebook.
Share popular news stories from blogs you watch on Blogger, WordPress, Livejournal or TypePad or Tumblr.
Share popular pictures from Instagram and/or video-snippets from Vine.
steps.description: If they've hit popularity, the Digg system can trigger this change and add these posts to the list of news-worthy pages on their site.
